examples: Micromeria parviflora f. monantha Latzel ex Šilić, Monogr. Satureja 262. 1979
notes: According to Jiří Danihelka (BRNU), the variant name “A. Latzel-Ragusa is a misinterpretation of a label. Ragusa is the Italian name for the city of Dubrovnik, now in Croatia. Albert Latzel was a military doctor with the Austrian marine in Boka Kotorska, and he frequently collected around Dubrovnik/Ragusa.
